landing.subtitle: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life

phrase1.part1: Build a body that speaks for you.

phrases.phrase2: Transform your physique. Transform your life.

phrase3.part1: With no muscles comes no respect.
phrase3.part2: Build a body that commands attention.

phrases.phrase4: Discipline builds muscle. Muscle builds confidence.
phrases.phrase6: Your body is your first impression. Make it count.

philosophy.legacy: We combine ambition with transformation. Through discipline and dedication, Golden Era delivers unmatchable results for those who dare to become successful people.
philosophy.text: In a world full of weak individuals, strength is what dominates. Transform your body with science. Reclaim your respect. This program is only for those who are ready to become part of the Elite.

results.title: Guaranteed
results.text: Train with those who lead this world. We only take 50 clients per year. This program is not for everyone, it's only for the ones who dare to become elite. Experience your ideal body in just 60 days.

coach.title: Your Coach
coach.name: Mateo Haces
coach.description: Fan of weights, and specialist in calisthenics, and MMA. CEO of Golden Era.

method.title: GOLDEN ERA METHOD
method.description: Our proven 3-step system to transform your body and mind into an unstoppable force.

material.title: Access Premium Material

work.title: Work & Transform
work.description: Follow the program with discipline, track your progress, and watch your body transform into its golden version.

testimonial1.text: Greatness isn't born; it is achieved through relentless discipline.
testimonial1.author: Andrew Tate

testimonial2.text: Your body is your empire. Build it with sweat, not excuses.
testimonial2.author: Amades Llanos

testimonial3.text: The only way you gain mental toughness is to do things you're not happy doing. If you're comfortable, you're not growing.
testimonial3.author: David Goggins
